facet_1.name: Resonance
facet_1.effects: Magnetize now grants self bonus attack damage whenever an enemy unit is affected by the debuff.

facet_2.name: Stepping Stone
facet_2.effects: Stone Remnant is no longer a charge-based ability, and has a shorter duration with a cooldown. -40 Remnant Duration. Rolling Boulder no longer destroys the Stone Remnant it collided with, and refreshes Stone Remnant's cooldown when the roll ends.

facet_3.name: Ready to Roll
facet_3.effects: Rolling Boulder over an allied hero causes Earth Spirit to travel even further and faster, while granting the allied hero bonus movement speed. Applies a stun duration bonus akin to rolling over a Stone Remnant toward enemy units as well. +2.5Ã— Ally Roll Distance Factor

effects: Temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant
After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies
Geomagnetic Grip can now target other allied units

abilities.name: Stone Remnant
abilities.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location. Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and interacts with all Earth Spirit's abilities. Gains additional charges whenever Earth Spirit levels up to certain levels.
abilities.details: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.

ability_1.name: Boulder Smash
ability_1.details: Smashes the target enemy or allied unit, sending them in the direction he is facing. The traveling unit damages all enemy units it hits.
ability_1.description: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

facet_effects.scepter: When Earth Spirit is an Enchanted Remnant, Boulder Smash is a non-targeted ability and automatically casts on himself. The ability now considers Earth Spirit as a Stone Remnant.

interaction_notes: If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit within the radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants
The traveling Stone Remnant damages all enemy units it hits
If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed
Stone Remnants travel further than other units

ability_2.name: Rolling Boulder
ability_2.details: Gathers himself into a boulder and rolls toward the target location after a slight delay, deals damage and stuns enemy units. Earth Spirit will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or when being disabled.
ability_2.description: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.

facet_effects.stepping_stone: Rolling Boulder no longer destroys the Stone Remnant it collided with, and refreshes Stone Remnant's cooldown when the roll ends.
facet_effects.ready_to_roll: Rolling Boulder over an allied hero causes Earth Spirit to travel even further and faster, while granting the allied hero bonus movement speed.

interaction_notes: Rolling over a Stone Remnant causes Earth Spirit to travel further, faster, and stun enemy units for a longer duration
Cannot recast the ability while the Rolling Boulder modifier is active

ability_3.name: Geomagnetic Grip
ability_3.details: Pulls the targeted allied or enemy unit. Enemy units struck by the pulled target will be silenced.
ability_3.description: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.

facet_effects.shard: Geomagnetic Grip can now target other allied units.

interaction_notes: Enemy units struck by the gripped Stone Remnant will be silenced and damaged
The silence debuff of Geomagnetic Grip refreshes and spreads within the Magnetize radius

ability_4.name: Enchant Remnant
ability_4.details: Temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.
ability_4.description: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
interaction_notes: Has an extended cast range when cast on allied units
Can be cast on Stone Remnants, and has a lower cooldown when used that way
The Stone Remnant cannot expire while being Enchanted

ability_5.name: Magnetize
ability_5.details: Magnetizes enemy units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times.
ability_5.description: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

facet_effects.resonance: Magnetize now grants self bonus attack damage whenever an enemy unit is affected by the debuff. Attack Damage Bonus: 40/80/120, Duration: 8

technical_details: Move Speed Slow Duration Refresh: varies
interaction_notes: Stone Remnants that spread Magnetize has expires after a set duration
Earth Spirit can utilize the Magnetized Stone Remnants within the duration before it is destroyed
Heroes affected by the Magnetize debuff refreshes the Boulder Smash movement speed slow duration
Heroes affected by the Magnetize debuff refreshes the Geomagnetic Grip silence duration
The ability buff can now only be dispelled by death, rather than any dispel
